text: Luc Van Hove (born 1957, Wilrijk, Belgium) is a Belgian composer. Van Hove studied at the Royal Conservatory of Antwerp. Afterwards he pursued advanced studies at the Mozarteum University of Salzburg and at the University of Surrey. He has gained several awards and is a teacher at the Lemmensinstituut of Leuven and at the Royal Conservatoire of Antwerp. His works are in a broadly contemporary classical style and written in a range of forms and for a variety of ensembles. ==See also== * Alex Otterlei ==References== * Weytjens, S.
